alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Florence, northeastern Georgetown, southwestern Horry, south central Marion and central Williamsburg Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 800 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Indiantown, or 8 miles east of Kingstree, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingstree, Johnsonville, Hemingway, Rhems, Salters, Oatland, Nesmith, Indiantown, Bucksport, Plantersville, Outland, Yauhannah, Morrisville, Henry, Stuckey and Williamsburg Regional Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Georgetown; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Williamsburg
